SEARCH
Package cz.itnetwork.entity.repository

Interface InvoiceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<InvoiceEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<InvoiceEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<InvoiceEntity,Long>
public interface InvoiceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<InvoiceEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<InvoiceEntity>
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and custom queries on InvoiceEntity.

This interface extends JpaRepository to provide standard CRUD operations and JpaSpecificationExecutor to support querying using JPA Specifications. It includes additional custom methods for finding invoices based on buyer and seller IDs, as well as for retrieving aggregated invoice statistics.

Since:
2024

  • Method Details

    • findByBuyerIdIn

      List<InvoiceEntity> findByBuyerIdIn(List<Long> buyerIds)
      Finds invoices where the buyer's ID is in the provided list of buyer IDs.
      Parameters:
      buyerIds - a list of buyer IDs to filter invoices by
      Returns:
      a list of InvoiceEntity instances that match the provided buyer IDs

    • findBySellerIdIn

      List<InvoiceEntity> findBySellerIdIn(List<Long> sellerIds)
      Finds invoices where the seller's ID is in the provided list of seller IDs.
      Parameters:
      sellerIds - a list of seller IDs to filter invoices by
      Returns:
      a list of InvoiceEntity instances that match the provided seller IDs

    • findInvoiceStatistic

      @Query("SELECT new cz.itnetwork.dto.InvoiceStatisticDTO(SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(i.issued) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) THEN i.price ELSE 0 END), SUM(i.price), COUNT(i)) FROM invoice i") InvoiceStatisticDTO findInvoiceStatistic()
      Retrieves aggregated statistics for invoices.

      This query calculates the total sum of invoices for the current year, the total sum of all invoices, and the total count of invoices. The result is returned as an instance of InvoiceStatisticDTO.

      Returns:
      an InvoiceStatisticDTO containing the aggregated invoice statistics
